HB 994 Sep 16: 2 small bergs & 1 large one (as reported by The Associated Press) in 45.28N 27.18W. Marine Observer Vol.9 1932. [Ship passed The Downs on Sep 2 and arrived in New York on 14th, i.e. 12 days for 3300 nm, or 275 nm/day. On the 10th  should have travelled approx 2200 miles, a long way past a lon of 27W so very likely lon is a typo for 47.18. Original location also too far south for normal routing.
